document_data.mainbody: ''Lair Assault''''' is a series of organized play adventures for 4{{th}} edition ''[[Dungeons & Dragons]]'', published between 2011 and 2012. Each adventure is designed as a challenging mega-encounter to be played out over the course of a few hours.
